testcase.name: Register with mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................passed When User enters first name "Ravikanth" Into the First Name field...........passed And Enters lastname "Lella" into the Last Name field........................passed And Enters email address "ravikanthlella@gmail.com" into the Email field....passed And Enters telephone "1234567890" into the Telephone field..................passed And Enters password "12345" into the Password field.........................passed And Enters password "12345" into the Password Confirm field.................passed And Selects Privacy Policy field............................................passed And Click on Continue button................................................passed Then Account should get successfully created................................passed

testcase.name: Register with all fields
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................passed When User enters first name "Ravikanth" Into the First Name field...........passed And Enters lastname "Lella" into the Last Name field........................passed And Enters email address "ravikanthlella@gmail.com" into the Email field....passed And Enters telephone "1234567890" into the Telephone field..................passed And Enters password "12345" into the Password field.........................passed And Enters password "12345" into the Password Confirm field.................passed And Selects Yes for Newsletter..............................................passed And Selects Privacy Policy field............................................passed And Click on Continue button................................................passed Then Account should get successfully created................................passed

testcase.name: Register without providing any fields.
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................passed When User donot enter details into any fields...............................passed And Click on Continue button................................................passed Then Warning messages should be displayed for all the mandatory fields......passed

testcase.name: Login attempt with invalid credentials
